meta_title: IProtect Clear lenses 1.0 Reader
short_description: Bifocal safety glasses with diopter strength +1.0 or higher.  Frameless, most widely worn style, safety glasses provides great wraparound optical protection.  Integrated nose pads.  Lenses offer 99% UV protection.  Stainless steel hinge screws.  Meets ANSI Z87.1 - Impact.
summary: Bifocal safety glasses.  Powers +1.0 through +3.0.  9.5 base curve offers great wrap around protection.  Hard coated polycarbonate lens offers 99% UV protection.  Meets the requirements of ANSI Z87.1 - Impact.

meta_title: Americana Cap, Standard, 4-point nylon
description: High density polyethylene cap features short peak and low profile and 4-point woven nylon suspension with easy Quick-Slide sizing which adjusts from head sizes 6 1/2 - 8. Functional rain trough.  Accessory slots accommodate a wide variety of eye, face and hearing protection and cap accommodates chin strap.  Goggle retaining slots molded on suspension.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Certified when headband is installed in reverse position.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E and G requirements.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: Americana Cap, Standard, 4-point nylon

meta_title: Americana Cap Vented, Standard, 4-point nylon
description: High density polyethylene cap with vents on top of helmet shell to increase air circulation and aid in keeping wearer's head cooler.   Shell design features short peak and low profile and comes with 4-point woven nylon suspension with easy Quick-Slide sizing which adjusts head sizes 6 1/2 - 8 and accommodates a chin strap.  Accessory slots accommodate a wide variety of eye, face and hearing protection.  Goggle retaining slots molded on suspension.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Certified when headband is installed in reverse position.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C requirements.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: Americana Cap Vented, Standard, 4-point nylon

meta_title: 901 Bump Cap, 4-point plastic
description: Ideal for protecting head from lacerations, minor bumps and bruises in areas that do not require certified safety helmets. 4-point injection-molded pin-lock suspension adjusts from head sizes 6.5 - 7.75.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Flat front design easily accommodates personal gear such as lights or badges.  Does not meet ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 requirements.  Not a hard hat.

The hinged, padded ratchet is low hanging and adjustable for a perfect fit at nape of neck.  Helmet accommodates chin strap and a variety of hard hat accessories.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Goggle retaining slots on suspension.  Certified when headband installed in reverse position.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 Standard.  Made in the USA.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E & G requirements.
meta_keyword: Omega II Cap, Mega Ratchet, 6-point nylon

description: Shade 5 polycarbonate face shield measures 7.75" x 15.5"  .040 thick. Face shield windows ship flat in protective film, 20 per box.  Face shield is considered secondary face protection.  Proper eye protection must be worn with face shields.  Made in USA.  Provides 99% UV protection.
summary: Fits:  E13 E14 E15 E16 E16R E17 E18 E19 E21 5001 Visor Carrier
meta_keyword: 8168 Polycarbonate Face Shield, Shade 5

meta_title: 8170 Polycarbonate Face Shield (E12)
description: 8" x 12" x .060" thick clear, hard coated, polycarbonate face shield fits E12 (15160) Deluxe Ratchet Headgear System from ERB Safety.  Face shields are considered secondary eye protection only.  Proper eye protection must be worn with face shields.  Provides 99% UV protection.
meta_keyword: 8170 Polycarbonate Face Shield (E12)

meta_title: 8191 Steel Mesh Screen
description: Steel mesh screen measures 9.5" x 15.5" and provides protection from flying debris.  Meets the requirements of ANSI Z87-S 1992.  Fits E13, E15, E16, E16R, E17, E18 and E20.  Face shield is considered secondary face protection.  Proper eye protection must be worn with face shields.
meta_keyword: 8191 Steel Mesh Screen

meta_title: 9000F Knitted Full Face Winter Liner
description: 100% polyester knit with elastic for snug fit around edge of cap.  Liner covers full face except over eye area.  Winter liner prevents wind from tunneling under the helmet while keeping face and neck warm.
meta_keyword: 9000F Knitted Full Face Winter Liner

meta_title: Americana Full Brim, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: High density polyethylene full brim hard hat features a 4-point woven nylon suspension with easy-turn knob Mega Ratchet sizing which adjusts from head sizes 6 1/2 - 8. Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E and G requirements.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: Americana Full Brim, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon

meta_title: Wildlands Fire Resistant Chin Strap
description: Flame resistant 3/4" Nomex and Kevlar material chin strap with metal postman's slide fastener and quick release buckle.  Designed to wear with the Americana Wildlands and Americana Heat helmets; however, chin strap fits all ERB style hard hats, cap and full brim styles. Chin strap is easy to adjust for perfect and secure fit.  Made in USA.
summary: Flame resistant 3/4" Nomex and Kevlar material.  Metal postman's slide fastener and quick release buckle.  Designed to wear with the Americana Wildlands and Americana Heat helmets but will fit all ERB style helmets except model #67 Bump Cap.
meta_keyword: Wildlands Fire Resistant Chin Strap

meta_title: I285 Replacement Suspension
description: I285 Slide-Lock replacement suspension fits Liberty cap style hard hat.  4-point injection-molded, polyethylene suspension adjusts from head sizes 6.625 to 8.  The suspension material is specially formulated for pliable comfort and strength as well as to provide a smooth sliding action. Made in USA.
meta_keyword: I285 Replacement Suspension

meta_title: I285R Replacement Suspension
description: I285R Secure-Fit Ratchet replacement suspension fits Liberty cap style hard hat.  4-point injection-molded, polyethylene suspension adjusts from head sizes 6.625 to 8.  The ratchet features an easy turn knob that locks with 50 meshing teeth to secure selected size.  The no-slip hold maintains the desired fit even in the most physical of jobs and weather conditions.  The padded, hinged ratchet hangs low on the nape of the neck and is height adjustable for a personalized fit.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: I285R Replacement Suspension

meta_title: I-505 Replacement Suspension

meta_title: Omega II Cap, Mega Ratchet, 6-point nylon
description: Molded from high density polyethylene for maximum protection. 6-point woven nylon suspension with easy-turn knob Mega Ratchet sizing which adjusts head sizes 6 1/2 - 8.  The hinged, padded ratchet is low hanging and adjustable for a perfect fit at nape of neck.  Helmet accommodates chin strap and a variety of hard hat accessories.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Goggle retaining slots on suspension.  Certified when headband installed in reverse position.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 Standard.  Made in the USA.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E & G requirements.
meta_keyword: Omega II Cap, Mega Ratchet, 6-point nylon

short_description: Samson back support with adjustable 1.5" W black elastic suspenders and adjustable hook and loop material at waist provide for best fit. Unisex sizing is measured at widest point of hips or waist, size Small is 28" - 32".

Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Certified when headband is installed in reverse position.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard. meta_title: Americana Cap Vented, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: High density polyethylene cap with vents on top of helmet shell to increase air circulation and aid in keeping wearer's head cooler.   Shell design features short peak and low profile and comes with 4-point woven nylon suspension with easy-turn Mega Ratchet knob sizing which adjusts head sizes 6 1/2 - 8.  Low hanging, padded ratchet adjustment is height adjustable which allows for perfect fit.  Accessory slots accommodate a wide variety of eye, face and hearing protection.  Goggle retaining slots molded on suspension.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Certified when headband is installed in reverse position. meta_title: Americana Full Brim Vent, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: High density polyethylene full brim with vents on top of shell to increase air circulation and aid in keeping wearer's head cooler. Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable. Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C requirements.  Made in USA.

meta_title: C421 Crown Cooler
description: Crown Cooler keeps wearer's head cool through evaporative cooling technology.  Coolerz provides longer time of use than other evaporative systems. Crown pad fits all ERB Safety helmets' suspensions.
meta_keyword: C421 Crown Cooler

meta_title: C420 Neck Shield
description: Neck shield keeps neck cool through evaporative cooling technology.  Coolerz provides longer time of use than other evaporative systems. Shield fits around back of suspension on all ERB Safety hard hats.
meta_keyword: C420 Neck Shield

meta_title: GP8-611 (MGP100) Girl Power Mechanics Gloves, Black with Pink Gloves
short_description: Dimensionally proportioned, resized fingers, and narrower hand width is why these gloves fit women's hands better than competitors gloves for women.  Black synthetic leather located at padded palm, fingertips and vented fourchettes.  Black spandex and foam glove back will not constrict hand movement as you work.   Black neoprene cuff with lycra binding and size adjustable hook & loop cuff closure helps with wearer comfort.  The thumb of the glove is made from absorbent terry cloth material and is helpful to whisk away perspiration when the brow is wiped.  Packaged Retail Ready.

meta_title: W651 Class 2 Women's Fitted Soft Shell Jacket Hi Viz Lime and Black
short_description: Women's Type R, Class 2 Soft Shell Jacket has contoured waist and is designed to fit women.  Jacket composed of three fused fabric layers:  polyester and spandex soft outer shell, weather resistant middle and warm brushed fleece interior.  Jacket is breathable and provides water and wind resistance.  Jacket features include two exterior slash pockets with waterproof zipper, drawstring hem with cord stopper, adjustable cuffs, and full zipper front with tunnel collar.  Black bottom hides grease and grime. Meets ANSI/ISEA 107 - 2015 requirements.

meta_title: Americana Cap, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: High density polyethylene cap features short peak and low profile and 4-point nylon webbing suspension with easy-turn knob Mega Ratchet sizing which adjusts from head sizes 6 1/2 - 8. Hinged, padded ratchet adjustment is low hanging and adjustable for a perfect fit at nape of neck.  Functional rain trough.  Accessory slots accommodate a wide variety of eye, face and hearing protection and cap accommodates chin strap.  Goggle retaining slots molded on suspension.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Certified when headband is installed in reverse position.  Meets the Low Temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard.  Meets ANSI Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E and G requirements.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: Americana Cap, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon

meta_title: Omega360 Cap, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: ANSI Type II hard hat molded from high density polyethylene. 4-point woven nylon suspension with Secure-fit ratchet adjusts to head sizes, 6 1/2 - 8.  Padded, hinged ratchet hangs at nape of neck and is height adjustable for personalized fit.  Hat accepts chin strap.  Goggle retaining slots on suspension. Accommodates a variety of eye, face and hearing products.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Meets the low temperature (LT) option of the Z89.1 standard.  Meets ANSI Z89.1, Type II, Class C, E & G requirements.

meta_title: 913 Ball Cap Bump
description: 100% cotton ball cap with ABS shell cap insert. Protects against lacerations, minor bumps and bruises in areas that do not require certified safety helmets. Hook & loop head size adjustment. Vent holes for breathability.  913 shell is not interchangeable with other ball caps.  Does NOT meet ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 requirements.  Not a hard hat.
meta_keyword: 913 Ball Cap Bump

meta_title: 67 Bump Cap, Pinlock, 4-point plastic
description: Ideal for protecting head from lacerations, minor bumps and bruises in areas that do not require certified safety helmets.  Molded from high density polyethylene, cap has perforated sides to provide ventilation.  4-point injection molded pin-lock suspension adjusts from head sizes 6 1/2 - 7 3/4.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  Does not meet ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 requirements. Not a hard hat.  Made in USA.

meta_title: 5001 Nylon Face Shield Carrier
description: Face Shield carrier with hard hat slots attachment must be paired with 2800 Ear Muff Attachment to fit ERB Safety Omega II cap style hard hats.
summary: Black Dielectric carrier will accommodate 12" L or 15.5" L up to .060" thick.   Meets ANSI Z87.1 - Impact when paired with 8150 polycarbonate face shield.   Made in USA.
meta_keyword: 5001 Nylon Face Shield Carrier

meta_title: 5050 Ear Muff Mounting Bracket
description: Attaches 5000 bracket to Omega II cap style helmet for use without earmuff.  One pair.
meta_keyword: 5050 Ear Muff Mounting Bracket

meta_title: Americana Full Brim, Wildlands, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: Meets NFPA 1977 Standard on Protective Clothing and Equipment for Wildland Fire Fighting, 2011 Edition and ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E & G requirements.  Americana Wildlands Full Brim style polycarbonate hard hat comes with Nomex/Kevlar Chinstrap with postman's slide fastener and quick release buckle, three goggle retaining clips on hat shell, four yellow fluorescent retroreflective strips attached to shell, tape to attach neck shroud and affixed under-brim glare guard.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  4-point nylon webbing suspension has Mega-Ratchet knob which adjusts head sizes from 6.5 to 8.  Low hanging, padded, hinged ratchet is height adjustable for personalized fit.  Made in USA.  Provides protection in environments with higher ambient temperatures or radiant heat such as outdoor wildlands fire fighting.
meta_keyword: Americana Full Brim, Wildlands, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon

meta_title: Americana Full Brim, Wildlands, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon
description: Meets NFPA 1977 Standard on Protective Clothing and Equipment for Wildland Fire Fighting, 2011 Edition and ANSI/ISEA Z89.1 Type I, Class C, E & G requirements.  Americana Wildlands Full Brim style polycarbonate hard hat comes with Nomex/Kevlar Chinstrap with postman's slide fastener and quick release buckle, three goggle retaining clips on hat shell, four yellow fluorescent retroreflective strips attached to shell, tape to attach neck shroud and affixed under-brim glare guard.  Moisture wicking brow pad is removable, washable and replaceable.  4-point nylon webbing suspension has Mega-Ratchet knob which adjusts head sizes from 6.5 to 8.  Low hanging, padded, hinged ratchet is height adjustable for personalized fit.  Made in USA.  Provides protection in environments with higher ambient temperatures or radiant heat such as outdoor wildlands fire fighting.
meta_keyword: Americana Full Brim, Wildlands, Mega Ratchet, 4-point nylon

meta_title: 304V Replacement Brow Pad, Vinyl
description: 304V replacement black vinyl on top of polyester foam brow pad is washable.  Brow pad is compatible with suspensions for ERB Safety's Americana, Americana Vent, Americana Wildlands, Americana Heat, Americana360, Omega II and Omega360 hard hats.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: 304V Replacement Brow Pad, Vinyl

meta_title: Four-Point Chin Strap with Chin Guard
description: Elastic Chin Strap with slider size adjustment has four attachment points to affix to the Americana cap with four chin strap attachment points.  Features a plastic contoured protective chin cup which slides to offer a personal and secure fit.  Hard hats sold separately.
meta_keyword: Four-Point Chin Strap with Chin Guard

meta_title: A110 Doo Rag Hi Viz Lime
description: 100% polyester birdseye knit mesh, three panel headwrap.  Adjustable ties in back to securely fit most.
meta_keyword: A110 Doo Rag Hi Viz Lime

meta_title: Lester Lid Hard Hat Liner Camouflage pattern
description: 100% polyester hard hat liner with moisture wicking treatment that allows perspiration to be drawn away from skin to outside of liner for evaporation.  Terry cloth sweatband is sewn in liner.  Lester Lid is lightweight and easily attaches to hard hat suspension.  Washable.
meta_keyword: Lester Lid Hard Hat Liner Camouflage pattern

meta_title: Lester Lid Hard Hat Liner Flag pattern
description: 100% polyester hard hat liner with moisture wicking treatment that allows perspiration to be drawn away from skin to outside of liner for evaporation.  Terry cloth sweatband is sewn in liner.  Lester Lid is lightweight and easily attaches to hard hat suspension.  Washable.
meta_keyword: Lester Lid Hard Hat Liner Flag pattern

meta_title: STR 1 Hard Hat Rack
description: Fits over vehicle seat and is easy to  install.  Plated steel rack is adjustable and holds cap and full brim style hard hats.  The rack fits over most vehicle seats.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: STR 1 Hard Hat Rack

meta_title: AS4E3 Americana Full Brim Vent Shield
description: Sun Shield provides additional UV protection for wearer.  Opaque covering with see-through smoke colored Lexan front for overhead visibility. Model AS4E3 fits ERB Safety's Americana Vent Full Brim hat only.  Sun Shield weighs less than 3 oz.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: AS4E3 Americana Full Brim Vent Shield

meta_title: S268 Mesh Neck Shield Hi Viz Lime
description: Ultra-light weight 100% polyester Hi-Viz Lime mesh neck shield.  Elastic band fits around brim of all ERB Safety Cap style and Full Brim style helmets.
meta_keyword: S268 Mesh Neck Shield Hi Viz Lime

meta_title: S268 Mesh Neck Shield Hi Viz Orange
description: Ultra-light weight 100% polyester Hi-Viz Orange mesh neck shield.  Elastic band fits around the brim of all ERB Safety Cap style and Full Brim style helmets.
meta_keyword: S268 Mesh Neck Shield Hi Viz Orange

meta_title: 360 Reflective Strip Silver
description: Self-adhesive 3M™ silver reflective material measures 1 1/8" W x 23" L.  Strip is curved to fit around ERB Safety helmets.  Exceeds the minimum reflectivity requirements of ANSI/ISEA 107 for Hi-Visibility head wear.  Strip provides increased visibility both day and night.  Made in USA.
meta_keyword: 360 Reflective Strip Silver

meta_title: ANSI Reflective Strip
description: Sheet has 7 reflective strips each.  Self-adhesive backed Oralite retroreflective material provides increased visibility day and night.  Strip measures: 1/2" W x 22" L  and is curved to fit ERB Safety helmets. Exceeds the minimum reflectivity requirements of ANSI/ISEA 107 for Hi-Visibility head wear.  Made in USA.

meta_title: Hard Hat Safety Light Amber
description: Can be seen up to 1/2 mile.  Four bright Led lights hold three light patterns:  fast flash, pulse flash and steady.  Includes two AAA batteries and plastic mounting bracket with 3M adhesive.  Each light only weighs 1.6 ounces.  Light can be printed with logo, call for quote.
meta_keyword: Hard Hat Safety Light Amber

meta_title: Hard Hat Safety Light Red
description: Can be seen up to 1/2 mile.  Four bright Led lights hold three light patterns:  fast flash, pulse flash and steady.  Includes two AAA batteries and plastic mounting bracket with 3M adhesive.  Each light only weighs 1.6 ounces.  Light can be printed with logo, call for quote.
meta_keyword: Hard Hat Safety Light Red

meta_title: 2800 Sound Shield
description: Low profile arm assembly provides convenient at-rest and storage position plus tension adjustment feature.  Dielectric.  Meets ANSI S3.19 requirements.  NRR 28dB (when used as directed).  Ear muffs fit the accessory slots of all ERB Safety cap style hard hats.
meta_keyword: 2800 Sound Shield

meta_title: 251A Full Brim Ear Muff, Plastic
description: Ear muffs with arms for use with ERB Safety's slotted Americana Full Brim hard hat. Meets ANSI S3.19 requirements. NRR 25dB (when used as directed).
meta_keyword: 251A Full Brim Ear Muff, Plastic

meta_title: 251B Full Brim Ear Muff, Metal
description: Ear muffs with arms for use with ERB Safety's slotted Americana Full Brim hard hat. Meets ANSI S3.19 requirements. NRR 25dB (when used as directed).
meta_keyword: 251B Full Brim Ear Muff, Metal

meta_title: S291 Hard Hat Cover Hi Viz Lime
description: Contrasting mesh and high gloss reflective tape enhances visibility of wear in light or dark working conditions.  Fits all ERB Safety cap and full brim style hard hats with elastic band at bottom cover.
meta_keyword: S291 Hard Hat Cover Hi Viz Lime

meta_title: S291 Hard Hat Cover Hi Viz Orange
description: Contrasting mesh and reflective material greatly enhance both day and night visibility.  Fits all ERB cap and full brim style helmets.
meta_keyword: S291 Hard Hat Cover Hi Viz Orange

meta_title: S486 Leg Gaiters Hi Viz Lime
description: Polyester oxford PU coated leg gaiters have adjustable hook & loop material on back to help fit around most legs.  Length of gaiters is 17.5" long with elastic at top and bottom.  Reflective tape provides additional visibility.
meta_keyword: S486 Leg Gaiters Hi Viz Lime

meta_title: S487 Leg Gaiters Hi Viz Lime Contrasting Trim
description: Polyester oxford PU coated leg gaiters have adjustable hook & loop material on back to help fit around most legs.  Length of gaiters is 17.5" long with elastic at top and bottom.  2" silver reflective tape backed by contrasting trim provides additional visibility to wearer.
meta_keyword: S487 Leg Gaiters Hi Viz Lime Contrasting Trim

meta_title: BP1 Backpack Hi Viz Lime
description: Backpack measure 8" x 13" x 19" and is made from 100% polyester 600D oxford material with PVC coating is water repellant.  Silver reflective strips provide additional visibility.  Three pockets:  2 side pockets with mesh vent and 1 front mesh pocket large enough to hold a full brim hard hat.  Can be worn traditionally with adjustable straps to provide secure fit or can be carried with handle at bag top.
meta_keyword: BP1 Backpack Hi Viz Lime

meta_title: W105 Class 3 Value Bomber Jacket Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom
short_description: ANSI Type R, Class 3 Bomber Jacket made from 100% polyester 300D oxford material with polyurethane coating.  Jacket meets all levels of water protection up to and including "water proof" per ANSI/ISEA 107.  Jacket features include:  mic tabs at each shoulder, zipper front closure and fleece lined comfort collar.  Jacket has four pockets:  2 exterior slash pockets, 1 right exterior radio/cell phone pocket with hook & loop flapped closure and 1 interior left chest pocket with hook & loop closure.  At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case.  Jacket is lined with taffeta and filled with polyfill.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107 - 2015.
meta_keyword: W105 Class 3 Value Bomber Jacket Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom

meta_title: W106 Class 3 Bomber Jacket Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom
short_description: Type R, Class 3 black bottom Bomber Jacket made from 100% polyester 300D oxford material with polyurethane coating.  Meets all levels for water protection up to and including "water proof" per ANSI/ISEA 107.  Jacket is lined with 100% polyester black fleece.  Zipper & snap front closure with adjustable fit cuffs. Three pockets:  2 exterior slash pockets with rain guards, 1 left interior chest pocket. At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case.  Hood is detachable and stowable.  Mic tabs located at each shoulder. Jacket has 2" additional body length and 1" additional sleeves length than base style W106.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.
meta_keyword: W106T Class 3 Tall Bomber Jacket Hi Viz Orange Black Bottom

meta_title: W570R Class 3 Ripstop Jacket Hi Viz Lime Black
short_description: ANSI/ISEA 107 Type R, Class 3 Jacket made from 300 denier Ripstop oxford material with polyurethane coating.  Jacket outer is water resistant.  Features include quilted lining interior sleeves, zipper and snap front closure with inner storm flap, mic tabs at each shoulder and detachable hood.  Five pockets on outer jacket shell.  Zip-out Type R, Class 2 Hi-Viz lime fleece vest with zip front closure and three pockets.  AwareLite retroreflective trim on both the outer jacket and interior vest.

meta_title: W650 Class 3 Men's Soft Shell Jacket Hi Viz Lime and Black
short_description: Men's Type R, Class 3 Soft Shell Jacket is composed of three fused fabric layers:  polyester and spandex soft outer shell, weather resistant middle and warm brushed fleece interior.  Jacket is breathable yet provides water and wind resistance.  Jacket features include two exterior slash pockets with waterproof zipper, drawstring hem with cord stopper, adjustable cuffs, and full zipper front with tunnel collar.  Black bottom hides grease and grime. Meets ANSI/ISEA 107 - 2015 requirements.
meta_keyword: W650 Class 3 Men's Soft Shell Jacket Hi Viz Lime and Black

meta_title: S860BIB Class E Rain Bibs Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom
short_description: 300D PU coated polyester with sealed seams Rain Bibs meets all levels of water protection up to and including "water proof" per ANSI/ISEA 107.  Features include adjustable suspenders, snap fly closure and adjustable snap at ankles.  Eight pockets:  1 upper chest pocket with zipper closure, 1 cell phone pocket and 4 pen pockets.  2 large open back pockets.  Hi-Viz Lime with Black Bottom and Suspenders.  Type R, Class 3 when worn with a Class 2 or Class 3 upper garment.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.
meta_keyword: S860BIB Class E Rain Bibs Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom

meta_title: S371 Class 3 Rain Coat Hi Viz Lime
short_description: ANSI Type R, Class 3, 100% polyester 300D oxford with polyurethane coating meets all levels of water protection, up to and including "waterproof" per ANSI/ISEA 107.  Coat length ranges from 30" to 33" in .5" increments.  Mesh lining inside coat and vents on back provide breathability.  Zipper and snap front closure for extra protection from wind and rain.  Coat features interior waist drawstring and detachable hood that is stowable in collar and three exterior pockets:  2 waist level flapped with snaps and 1 gusseted chest radio/cell phone pocket flapped with hook & loop closure.  At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case.  Reflective material is 3M Scotchlite brand.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.
meta_keyword: S371 Class 3 Rain Coat Hi Viz Lime

meta_title: S163 Class 3 Long Rain Coat Hi Viz Lime
short_description: Type R, Class 3 100% polyester 150D oxford with polyurethane coating long rain coat meets all levels of water protection up to and including "water proof" per ANSI/ISEA 107.  Front closure zips and snaps for extra protection from wind and rain.  Coat ranges in length from 50" to 53" in .5" increments.  100% polyester mesh lining and vent holes under arms aid with ventilation.  Hood is detachable and stowable in collar. short_description: Type R, Class 3 100% polyester 150D oxford with polyurethane coating long rain coat meets all levels of water protection up to and including "water proof" per ANSI/ISEA 107.  Front closure zips and snaps for extra protection from wind and rain.  Coat ranges in length from 50" to 53" in .5" increments.  100% polyester mesh lining and vent holes under arms aid with ventilation.  Hood is detachable and stowable in collar. Two exterior slash pocket with rain guard. At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.

meta_title: S373PT Class E Lightweight Rain Pants Hi Viz Lime
short_description: Rain Pants meet ANSI Class E (Ensemble) when not worn with other ANSI 107 garment.  100% polyester 150D oxford with polyurethane coating. Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015, Type R, Class 3 when worn with Class 2 or 3 upper garment.

meta_title: S849 Class E Rain Pants Hi Viz Lime, Black Bottom
short_description: 100% polyester 300D oxford polyurethane coated rain pants are waterproof with sealed seams and meets all levels of water protection up to and including "water proof" per ANSI/ISEA 107. Type R, Class 3 when worn with a Class 2 or Class 3 upper garment. Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.

meta_title: 9300SBSEG Class 2 Stretch Ripstop Vented Wind Shirt Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom
short_description: ANSI Type R, Class 2 Vented Sportsman shirt with short sleeves. Stretch ripstop woven polyester shirt is Hi-Viz Lime with Black bottom and offers UPF40+ UV sun protection. Seven button front with button-down collar.  Mesh panels under sleeves and back vent with breathable mesh lining provide cooling and comfort to wearer.  Chest pocket on either side of shirt with hook & loop closure.  Segmented AwareLite reflective tape moves with wearer and is non-constricting.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.
meta_keyword: 9300SBSEG Class 2 Stretch Ripstop Vented Wind Shirt Hi Viz Lime Black Bottom

short_description: ANSI Type R, Class 2 Surveyor's vest made from 100% polyester tricot and mesh.  Solid bottom front and back.  Mesh top front and back.  Zipper front closure. At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case.  Mic tabs placed on both shoulders.  AwareLite reflective trim back by contrasting orange trim.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.

meta_title: S149 Class 2 Mesh Hi Viz Lime Contrasting Trim Surveyor
short_description: ANSI Type R, Class 2 Surveyor's vest made from 100% polyester tricot and mesh.  Solid bottom front and back.  Mesh top front and back.  Zipper front closure.  Vest has ten pockets:  right chest pocket with two divisions, left chest pocket with four divisions, two exterior waist pockets with hook & look closure and two interior large open waist level pockets.  At least one pocket measures large enough to fit a 5.5" cell phone in sturdy case.  Mic tabs placed on both shoulders.  AwareLite reflective trim back by contrasting orange trim.  Meets ANSI/ISEA 107-2015.
meta_keyword: S149 Class 2 Mesh Hi Viz Lime Contrasting Trim Surveyor

meta_title: S252C Class 2 mesh/solid Surveyor Hi Viz Lime
short_description: ANSI/ISEA 107 - 2015 Type R, Class 2 compliant Surveyor's vest. 100% polyester solid front, mesh back. Reinforced front zipper closure. 15 pockets: 2 exterior flapped waist pockets with hook & loop closure, 2 exterior waist spray can pockets with elastic cinch, 2 zippered interior waist pockets, 2 exterior flapped chest pockets - one with hook & loop closure and 4 pen compartments, 2 interior waist pockets with heavy duty hook & loop security clasp and one large back vest pocket with right and left zipper access. meta_title: 4400 N95 Particulate Respirator
description: 4400 N95 Particulate Respirator provides 95% protection against non-oil particles.  4400 offers excellent filtering with low breathing resistance. Foldable for easy storage when not in use.  20 respirators per box.
meta_keyword: 4400 N95 Particulate Respirator

meta_title: 4400V N95 Particulate Respirator Valved
description: 4400V N95 Particulate Respirator provides 95% protection against non-oil particles.  4400V offers excellent filtering with low breathing resistance.  The respirator has a individually adjustable metal nose clip and its high density urethane foam nose piece reduces leakage and improves comfort.  The off-center, only-way valve allows respirator to fold for easy storage when not in use.  10 respirators per box.

meta_title: F4 Denim Shop Apron
description: Apron measures: 36" L x 24" W and is made from heavy Duty 10.5 oz. dark indigo denim to mask dirt and stains. Apron features four pockets:  1 4" H divided chest pocket and 1 5.25" H divided waist pocket.  Reinforced bartacks at all stress points on apron prevent ties from pulling away.
meta_keyword: F4 Denim Shop Apron

meta_title: Knee Pads
description: Slip resistant and lightweight knee pads with padding capped by abrasion resistant rubber for long-lasting wear.  Hook & loop closure fastens behind knee for adjustable fit.
meta_keyword: Knee Pads

meta_title: F16 Bib Nail Apron
description: Bib apron measures 23" L x 17" W and is made from durable poly/cotton blend duck canvas.  Reinforced bartacks at all stress points helps apron remain in use longer.  Apron features loop neck, bound edges, hammer loop and center divided pouch pocket with center pencil pocket. Good apron on which to advertise your company or event, call for quote.
meta_keyword: F16 Bib Nail Apron

meta_title: F15 Waist Nail Apron
description: Waist apron measures 9" L x 15" W and is made from durable poly/cotton blend duck canvas.  Reinforced bartacks at all stress points helps apron stay in use longer.  Apron features include bound edges, hammer loop and center divided pouch pocket with center pencil pocket. Good work apron on which to advertise your company or event, call for quote.
meta_keyword: F15 Waist Nail Apron

meta_title: 4148 .35mm PVC/Polyester Raincoat

meta_title: 4035 .35mm PVC/Polyester 3 piece Rainsuit
short_description: .35mm PVC on polyester three piece rainsuit is suited for light to medium duty applications.  Jacket has vented cape back, five snaps front closure with flap corduroy collar, adjustable snap closure wrists and two front patch pockets.   Jacket hood has drawstring to adjust fit and is removable.  Overalls have adjustable suspenders with triangle shaped buckles for secure fit, single snap fly front and adjustable snap closure at ankles.

meta_title: F85 Wrist Support
description: Lightweight, flexible elastic wrist support aids to reduce stress at the wrist.  Ideal for office work and light industrial use.  Open palm design with thumb strap.  Support has hook & loop closure which allows fit to be adjusted.
meta_keyword: F85 Wrist Support

meta_title: Emergency Air Horn
description: Easy to operate push button Air Horn can be heard up to one mile away, 127 dB. Non-flammable, ozone safe air horn meets EPA & USCG requirements.  The horn is impact resistant.  Net weight is 8 oz. and measures 7.75" H when horn is attached to can.  Canister with Air Horn is packaged in retail blister pack which is 10" H.  Refill cans available.
meta_keyword: Emergency Air Horn

meta_title: Emergency Air Horn Refill Canister
description: Non-flammable, ozone safe air meets EPA & USCG requirements.  Net weight is 8 oz. Refill canister is packaged in retail blister pack.
meta_keyword: Emergency Air Horn Refill Canister

meta_title: Caution Tape, Bilingual
description: Bilingual, English/Spanish, Yellow with Black letters Caution Tape.  Tape is 2.4 mil and measures 3" x 1000'.  Tape made from durable, low density polyethylene.
meta_keyword: Caution Tape, Bilingual

meta_title: Danger Tape, Bilingual
description: Bilingual, English/Spanish, Red with Black letters Danger Tape.  Tape is 2.4 mil and measures 3" x 1000'.  Tape made from durable, low density polyethylene.
meta_keyword: Danger Tape, Bilingual

meta_title: DSC10 OSHA Rebar Cap
description: Approved by California OSHA  #C1718AG.  Cover contains a curved steel plate which provides additional protection against falls that occur from an angle, preventing hazardous impalement. Fits rebar #3 up to #11.  Self-centering formed steel insert seats cover perpendicular to rebar.  Each Impalement Safety Cap is stamped with the California OSHA approval number as required by Cal/OSHA.  25 per carton.
meta_keyword: DSC10 OSHA Rebar Cap

meta_title: Sports Strap Retail Pack - Hi-Viz Pink
description: Hi-Viz Pink. Mono slide adjusts for perfect fit. Rubberized sleeves tightly hold spectacles. Strap is 22" long. Polypropylene blend.
meta_keyword: Sports Strap Retail Pack - Hi-Viz Pink

meta_title: Black Visor Carrier
description: Must be worn with 2800 Ear Muff Attachment. Accommodates 12" or 15" universal face shields. Molded from super tough nylon. Completely dielectric. Shield not included. For use with all ERB shields except model #8170.
meta_keyword: Black Visor Carrier

meta_title: 4160 Eyewear Clip-On Disposable Face Shield
description: Box contains 24 face shields, clips and assembly instructions. Designed to attach to ERB Safety IProtect and IFit Flex safety glasses, sold separately. Clear, lightweight PETG face shield measure 11" x 7" x .020" thick. Shield acts as additional barrier or separator between people.  Can be used for sanitary purposes acting as a sneeze guard, low velocity splash or particle guard.  Good for use in industrial settings, restaurants, food prep, etc.  This does not take the place of a face mask.  Designed to fit under the brim of ERB Safety's hard hats and bump caps. Screen reader support enabled.
meta_keyword: 4160 Eyewear Clip-On Disposable Face Shield

meta_title: 239 Foldable Ear Muff
short_description: Over-the-head, dielectric hearing protector fits a wide range of head sizes.  Soft, foam filled ear cushions give efficient seal and the green camo ear cups are height adjustable.  Protector uniquely folds when not in use allowing for convenient storage.  Meets ANSI S3.19 requirements.  NRR 23dB (when used as directed).  Retail Ready packaged.
meta_keyword: 239 Foldable Ear Muff

meta_title: 708SLC Latex Coated Knit Gloves
description: Size: Large. Cotton/polyester 7 gauge knit ribbed knit liner with light latex coated palm.  Straight thumb and knit wrist.  Brush off dirt.  Hand wash in cold water with like colors and mild detergent.  Lay flat to dry.  Do not use bleach, do not iron.
meta_keyword: 708SLC Latex Coated Knit Gloves

meta_title: A130 Hoodoo
description: Seamless 100% polyester is moisture wicking.  Configurable to wear multiple ways to help block the elements such as sun, wind, dust, etc.  Gaiter is machine washable.  Fabric is treated and is odor resistant.  One size fits most.
meta_keyword: A130 Hoodoo
